definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The second question is whether it cper generally be chargedinserted F joint?
sentences.chinese: 第二个题目就是能否没关系带电插拔F接头？

sentences.english: Incredible as it seems, live high voltage transmission lines can be worked barehanded.
sentences.chinese: 令人难以置信的，带电高压输电线路可以赤手操作。

sentences.english: In batteries, charged particles travel through electrolytes.
sentences.chinese: 在电池里，带电粒子穿过电解液。

sentences.english: No person shall work on energized electrical equipment without proper authorization.
sentences.chinese: 任何人不得未经授权进行带电作业。

sentences.english: Then electric fields generated by the solar wind sweep away the charged particles.
sentences.chinese: 然后，太阳风产生的电场将带电粒子一扫而空。

sentences.english: Don't charged inserted, otherwise it might burn out equipment.
sentences.chinese: 切勿带电插拔，否则可能烧坏设备。

sentences.english: In addition, the complexion of enacting standards for live working is described.
sentences.chinese: 另外，介绍了带电作业标准的制订情况。

sentences.english: Coulomb made the conjecture that electrical force F between two charged objects depends on two factors.
sentences.chinese: 库仑推测，两个带电体之间的电力f由两个因素决定。

sentences.english: This wire is intended to verify protection against access to hazardous live parts of electrical toys.
sentences.chinese: 本金属丝用于检验电动玩具的带电部件是否被触及。

sentences.english: In equipment operation, not plug equipment heat release part.
sentences.chinese: 请将运转的设备放置在通风处，不宜带电移动。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a charged-particle optical system with dual loading options.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及具有双装载选项的带电粒子光学系统。

sentences.english: Do not move the cover or live working when this product is drive into conduction.
sentences.chinese: 节电器在通电过程中，请勿打开面盖或进行带电作业。

sentences.english: The director deformation caused by a charged colloidal particle suspended in a nematic liquid crystal is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究悬浮在向列相液晶中带电胶粘引起的指向矢形变。

sentences.english: In this paper it is shown that there are two vector constants of the motion for a charged particle in the central field of force.
sentences.chinese: 证明了带电粒子在有心力场中运动时有两个守恒矢量。

sentences.english: The new computational models for describing streaming electrification of oil with laminar and turbulent flow states are presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了层流和紊流条件下新的管道油流带电计算模型。

definition: to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
to get an electric shock/to be electrocuted/electric shock
